mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow_relation WHERE follower_id = #{followerId} AND following_id = #{followingId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.bio FROM user_profile u INNER JOIN follow_relation f ON u.id = f.following_id WHERE f.follower_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.create_time DESC
